resources.string: Hello, I am an Android Developer by passion and profession. Certainly, I am not an Omniscient. But I am always eager to learn as much as possible. I strongly believe that Apps can make life much easier and can provide solution to day to day\'s problems. Some successful codes, a bit of chit chat and lots of coffee completes my day.

Having enrolled in Distributed Software Systems at Tu-Darmstadt,Germany gave me the opportunity to gain in-depth knowledge of Computer Systems. The course also provided me an exposure and better understanding of how to approach for System issues.

I did my Bachelor in Computer Science from Bhopal,India. The course which cleared my fundamentals of Computer Applications. Some really great learning experiences, which motivated me to take up Master course.
In my last job, I worked as Android Developer in Pass-Consulting, Aschaffenburg, Germany. I got the opportunity to work with a great team on development of app, based on the concept of Bla Bla car.

I got the opportunity to work as Android and Amazon Alexa Skill Developer with AGT International, Darmstadt, Germany. I got the opportunity to work independently on the projects. The projects consisted of Video Streaming Android Applications. Development of Alexa skill for each projects and integrating the Skills and Apps together. In a way that it can be played on Fire-Tv as well as Amazon Cube
Just after my Graduation, I got the offer to work with ARC Telecom, Bhopal, India as System Engineer. I was responsible for maintaining Company\'s software as well as website.
In my spare time, I love to try different things, Be it for personal gain or as a gratitude towards the society. Such as:
Some volunteer work of teaching to poor kids under the Dr. Reddy Foundation. Honestly, One of the best experience of my life. Hope to continue in the future as well.
Represented my School, College as well as my state(Zone) in Badminton and Chess.

Scrum Master Certification - An amazing experience of learning the concept of Agile work environment in real life based scenario. /n Bloomberg Aptitude Test - Answering questionnaires of different fields was an amazing experience and nice for boosting self confidence.
Here are few projects developed as a part of my learning experience.
You can find the details of the project on my Github repository. "https://github.com/rajs25"
